resources.string: Welcome to VplanPlus! The onboarding process will help you connect to your schools stundenplan24 instance.
It\'s an eight-digit number provided by your school.
That school id does not exist.
Enter your username (probably \'schueler\') and password. These credentials are provided by your institute.
Couldn\'t establish a connection to the server. Please check your internet connection.
Depending on your role at school you\'ll need to choose wether you want to see the data for teachers or students. Don\'t worry, you can still search for the other one later.
Choose this profile if you want to see the plan for a class by default. If you\'re a parent, choose this profile too.
If you\'re a teacher, choose this profile.
If you need to add multiple classes, you can do so by creating a new profile in settings.
Do you want to delete profile \'%1$s\'?
You can\'t delete the last existing profile for this school
Find your acronym. If you want to see your class as well, you can add another profile in settings later.
Choose this profile to view the schedules for a specific room at your school.
Here you can select a room that has been found at your school.

Sometimes, the base data of your school isn\'t up to date. The app will automatically add your acronym once there\'s some data about you. For now, select another profile and download this weeks data. If you\'re teaching some lessons this week, you can add yourself in the settings.
There is a new plan for %1$s at %2$s available (%3$s)
You won\'t receive any notifications if there are any changes to the plan.
Show notifications when app is in foreground
When disabled, you\'ll only get notifications for plan changes, when the app isn\'t visible.
Enjoy your weekend! Recharge and return on Monday with renewed energy for a productive week ahead. üåü
The weekend is almost here! üéâ Recharge and look forward to a relaxing break.
The weekend has come to a close. Wishing you a smooth start to the week ahead! ‚òïÔ∏è
Search for teachers, rooms and classes
Here you can have a quick peek at other plan views. If you need to talk to a specific teacher, you can search for him here.
To see the room occupancy map of another school, change your active profile.
Rename your profile to something you can recognize better. Keep yourself short to optimize readability when there\'s a profile icon. Clear text to reset its name to default.
The app will create an event that starts at your first lesson and ends at your last lesson every day.
This will create a calendar event for every single lesson.
If you want to receive notifications when there is a new plan for you available, grand access to the app.
If you\'d like to see your lessons in your calendar, you must give permission in order to use this feature. You can select the level of detail on a per profile basis later in settings.
Enable read access to your calendar
If you allowed the previous one, you\'ll need to allow this one too - it\'s for altering events when there is a change in plan.
There aren\'t any calendars on your system
If there are lessons that don\'t affect you, you can unselect them here so you won\'t get notified about changes regarding these lessons.
This profile does not match with the default lessons of its class. Fixing the problem will reset these settings.

For this day, there is no data available. Either your school hasn\'t released a substitution plan for this day, or it\'s too far in the future. You can change the number of days to sync after today in the settings.
You don\'t have to go to school today. Feel free to meet friends or tidy up your room.
There is a change in plan for %1$s at %2$s for %3$s
